Like a Pair Out of Hell!
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Library: Fan Fiction, Poetry, Birthday List, Links & Non-Fiction Archive: Filk Songs: Like a Pair Out of Hell!
By Icelord13 on Saturday, April 10, 2004 - 05:23 pm:

Hm, nothing's been going on in the library for a while so I've decided to parody the song, "Like a Bat Out of Hell" by Meatloaf. It's kinda strange because its supposed to be a rancher talking to his last monster, a hare. Well, here it is. Enjoy!

Like a Pair Out of Hell! to the tune of "Like a Bat Out of Hell copyright Meatloaf.

The crowd is screaming and the monsters are howling,
Way down in the coliseum tonight.
There's a Dragon in the shadows with a gleam in his eye,
And fangs shining oh so bright.
There's evil in the air and there's thunder in sky,
And a Naga’s on the bloodshot streets.
Oh and down in Takrama where the dead are rising,
Oh I swear I saw a monster down in the desert,
He was starting to foam in the heat.

Oh Hare you're the only thing in this whole ranch,
That's pure and ready to fight.
And wherever you are and wherever you go,
We're always gonna win in the night.
But you gotta get out there,
you gotta break it out now,
Before the final ring of the bell.
So we gotta make the most of our fight together.
When it's over you know,
We'll both be so well known.

Like a pair out of hell
We'll be champions when the morning comes.
When the monster fight is over
Like a pair out of hell
We'll have won won won.
Like a pair out of hell
We'll be champions when the morning comes.
But when the day is done and the sun goes down,
And the moonlights shining through,
Then like a psycho before the gates of hell,
We'll come crashing into you.

We're gonna hit the monsters like a battering ram,
On a silver phantom bike.
When the metal is hot and the engine is hungry,
And we're all about to start the fight.
Nothing ever grows in this rotting old ranch.
The other monsters are stunted and lost.
And nothing really rocks
And nothing really rolls
And nothing's ever worth the cost.
And I know that I'm damned if I don’t win now,
And maybe I'm damned if I do,
But with every other beat I've got left in my heart,
You know I'd rather be damned with you.
If I gotta be damned you know I wanna be damned,
Rolling through the fight with you.
If I gotta be damned you know I wanna be damned.
Gotta be damned you know I wanna be damned.
If I gotta be damned you know I wanna be damned,
Rolling through the night
Winning through the night
Crashing through the night with you.

Oh Hare you're the only thing in this whole ranch,
That's pure and ready to fight.
And wherever you are and wherever you go,
We're always gonna win in the night.
But you gotta get out there,
You gotta break it out now,
Before the final ring of the bell.
So we gotta make the most of our one fight together.
When it's over you know,
We'll both be so well known.

Like a pair out of hell
We'll be champions when the morning comes.
When the monster fight is over
Like a pair out of hell
We'll have won won won.
Like a pair out of hell
We'll be champions when the morning comes.
But when the day is done and the sun goes down,
and the moonlights shining through,
Then like a psycho before the gates of hell,
We'll come crashing into you.

I can see us now tearing up the others,
Faster than any other rancher has ever gone.
And my skin is raw but my soul is ripe.
No one's gonna stop us now,
I gotta earn my claim to fame.
But I can't stop thinking of you,
and I never see the sudden attack until it's way too late.
I never see the sudden attack 'till it's way too late.

Then I'm dying at the bottom of a pit in the blazing sun of Takrama.
Torn and twisted at the foot of a dying dream.
And I think somebody somewhere must be taking my place at the top.
And the last thing I see is our cause,
Still yearning,
Breaking out of my mind,
And drifting away,
Like a pair out of hell.
Then I'm dying at the bottom of a pit in the blazing sun of Takrama.
Torn and twisted at the foot of a dying dream.
And I think somebody somewhere must be taking my place at the top.
And the last thing I see is our cause.
Still yearning, still yearning,
Breaking out of my mind
Drifting and drifting away,
Like a pair out of hell.
Like a pair out of hell.
Like a pair out of hell.
Oh like a pair out of hell!
Oh like a pair out of hell!
Like a pair out of hell!!!

Hope you liked it! -Icelord13
